Title: Luna
Writer: Dave McKean (screenplay), Dave McKean (story), Allen Spiegel (story)
Actors: Ben Daniels, Dervla Kirwan, Stephanie Leonidas, Michael Maloney
Plot: After losing their baby, Grant and Christine visit a friend in his isolated and idyllic sea-side house. Over a long week-end, secrets are revealed and the life of the dead child is lived out in a series of fantastic dreams.
